title: Vanishing Čech obstruction implies equal HEO densities
statement_md: For the HEO sheaf on the cofinite topology (opens \(U_n=\{m\ge n\}\)), if the Čech 1-coboundary of the log-ratio sections \(\delta s\) vanishes on a cofinal cover, then the global upper densities coincide: \(\mathbf{H}_d^{S}(k)=\mathbf{H}_d^{S'}(k')\).
assumptions_md: Sections are defined as limsup densities over tails; restriction maps respect cofinal intersections.
